dct_description_sm: begun by John More ; continued and finished by John Speede.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Miles".
Shows topography, drainage, travel routess, places of historical interest.
Illustrations of a ship, sea creatures, compass rose, biblical events, settlements, and emblems of the tribes of Israel throughout.
2 decorative cartouches with illustrations of holy men.
7 pictorial vignettes surrounding inset map: [Biblical symbols and artificats].
Includes index: [Sites of interest pertaining to the tribes of Israel].
Descriptive text throughout: [Biblical verses] -- To the Christian reader.
Appears in Speed's The genealogies recorded in the Sacred Scriptures, in The book of common prayer. London : Robert Barker, 1611.
